channel.title: Old School Prestige Needs Developers
channel.description:
[b]Old School Prestige development thread:[/b] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,502671.0.html [i]Also check my forums in my signature.[/i]
[b]Base/Source:[/b] Shard/Project No-Doze (317 old school) [i] I DO need a hoster because I'm running on a dial-up connection, so if you're interested in that let me know and we can arrange something.[/i]
This is [B]NOT[/B] an RS remake, but it is vaguely accurate regarding shops, drops and NPC spawns.
The planned release is the 1st October 2011, when I get my new computer. And here's why I need developers...
I need: -Accurate NPC Spawns to RuneScape (doesn't need to be perfect). -Accurate NPC drops to RuneScape (doesn't need to be perfect). -Accurate Shops to RuneScape (doesn't need to be perfect). -A Client Developer (ONLY to add an updated whip animation as the current one is broken and Skillcape models).
What I don't need: -Someone to add 100k whips to my shops. -Someone to add 12 KBD's at Varrock square. -Someone to add 5k Manta rays as a drop from Men.
I've been sceptical to put my trust in anyone else regarding drops, shops and shops in case they be stupid and add something that isn't supposed to be there.
Remember this is an Old School server, and I need sensible people who are willing to help out on an upcoming server that needs lots of interaction and places to train for people (in the right place).
You will be given a special "Community Contributor" and reward ingame IF you decide to stay and play, all though you are not obligated.
Please use this to apply:
[code] [b]Age:[/b] [b]Which role?:[/b] [b]Any previous experience?:[/b] [/code]
Thanks, any questions, feel free to ask.

@LilXCj wrote:

Sure thing.

Read full topic

Even if I punch it closed the whole motherboard just moves.

Read full topic

I did do that actually. Haha.

item.title: Old School Prestige Needs Developers
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:14, topic:411634”][quote author=Muroth link=topic=512889.msg3722611#msg3722611 date=1314048276]
Age: 14
Which role?: Shops
Any previous experience?: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,406085.0.html

And I couldn’t get it to work because your host and my host has different settings and you didn’t give me the option to edit it.
[/quote]
Brilliant, as you are a loyal player AND I’ve already trusted you once, I know you’ll do a good job.

Okay, so the shops are entered via MySQL, so all I’ll need is numbers and commas, no spaces.

-You won’t need to do general shops.
-Any other shop you do, please submit to me in this format (PM or forums message).

Npc ID and name. (i.e. 519 - Bob).
Location (i.e. Lumbridge house).
1351,1349,1353,1355
7,7,5,1

It’s very important that the item IDs and amounts are on seperate lines, but in order. The above will stock 7x Bronze axe, 7x Iron axe, 5x Steel axe, 1x Mithril axe.

Thanks and accepted, welcome aboard. You’re now officially a part of OSP.[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Wrote them myself, that’ll be my contribution to this. (Source code is inside, if you ACTUALLY think I would put a virus in converters, read the topic for my rant)

If you modify them a bit, he can write them in the other shops format and you can use them in your SQL databases.

Btw, I did make these for No-Doze too.

Read full topic

Don’t run it through Eclipse. The server needs to access XML files to load up and I don’t know how to use it via Eclipse, as I already tried. Just run the Initialize-copy.bat.
[/quote]
it comes up with this shit

[code][00:00:00]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: Cannot cons

args constructor

Thanks milky, I will give you access to the ::addnpc command along with a description on how to use it and then get back to you. This will all be tomorrow because the server will be going off soon.

Work at 9:30am so will be on any time after 1pm.

@Milk. Hold on I’ll check your account. I know what it is now.
